content.title: Otter.ai’s new assistant can automatically transcribe your Zoom meetings
content.synopsis: A.I.-powered voice transcription service Otter.ai wants to make it even easier for its business users to record their meetings. The company is today introducing a new feature, Otter Assistant, whic...

content.title: El nuevo asistente de Otter.ai puede transcribir automáticamente sus reuniones de Zoom
